Name: Bomb Squad
Powers: AP 4 - Reduce block rolls by 4. Explosive - Dies after combat. Unprotected - Reveal this unit when an attack hits it, rather than using the default block.

Name: Beserkers
Powers: Random mover d3 - Roll a die for movement each turn. Movement is d3 spaces. Eager to Fight. - You must move the full distance, or collide with something. If the unit moves off the board, it is lost. Maneouverable - May turn once at any point during a move or hustle.

Name: Goblings
Powers: Chaff - Subtract 1 from leadership rolls. 6s still auto-succeed.

Name: Poppers
Powers: Burst - For each model that dies in combat, make an attack hitting on 4+ with AP1 against the unit that dealt the wound.

Name: Wolfcarts
Powers: Impact Hits d3 - If you get a charge bonus, do d3 attacks per model hitting on 4+. These count towards who won combat. Chariot - Can't sidestep

Name: Bangwagons
Powers: Explosive - Dies after combat. Powder Keg - d6 attacks per model AP 4 - Reduce block rolls by 4. Fast - Rolls two hustle die, so it can travel up to two extra squares. Unprotected - Reveal this unit when an attack hits it, rather than using the default block. Chariot - Can't sidestep

Name: Hunting Party
Powers: Fire on the Move - Can use ranged attacks after moving Multishot 3 - Ranged attacks roll 3 dice per model Maneouverable - May turn once at any point during a move or hustle Chariot - Can't sidestep

Name: Starchucker
Powers: War Machine - Dies if it flees. Can't move into combat. Razorstar - Ranged weapon. Range d6+1. The first unit in that range gets one attack that hits on 3+, AP -3, and does 3 wounds. If it hits, the next unit takes a 4+, AP -2, 2 wound attack. If that hits, the third unit takes a 5+, AP -1, 1 wound attack. This shot can't pass through terrain. Friendly Fire - Can shoot into combat and into friendly units.

Name: Boombox
Powers: War Machine - Dies if it flees. Can't move into combat. The Big Guns - Pick a target square within 6 and roll a die. 6 - Direct hit. 5 - Off by one, your choice. 4 - Off by one, towards the opponents board edge. 3 - Off by one, towards your board edge. 2 - Off by two, opponent's choice where. 1 - Hit yourself. The central tile takes d6 attacks, 3+ AP -1. The four adjacent tiles take 1 hit each, 4+ AP0. Friendly Fire - Can shoot into combat and into friendly units.

Name: Firetruck
Powers: Flamethrower - Special action. Can be used instead of attacking in combat or as a ranged attack. Roll a die for range. 6 - Range 3 5/4 - Range 2 3 - Range 1 2 - Take 1 wound 1 - Opponent turns you 90 degrees. Range 2. Hits all tiles in range across all three ranged attack columns. Each unit that is hit rolls a die for each model in the unit. Models are hit on a 5, AP1. Friendly Fire - Can shoot into combat and into friendly units.

Name: Flagellants
Powers: Unbreakable - Can't flee Rabid - Must charge if able to Unprotected - Reveal this unit when an attack hits it, rather than using the default block.

Name: Tincans
Powers: Stalwart - Add 1 to leadership rolls Slow - Can't hustle

Name: Skypriests
Powers: "Jetpacks" - Action: Roll 2d6. Move a number of tiles at least equal to the lower die, and up to the higher die. You can fly over other units. After landing, this unit may face any direction. If you choose to land on a unit, each model makes 2 attacks hitting at 4+ with AP 2, then this unit dies [explosive]. If this unit moves off the board, it dies.

Name: Skitterers
Powers: Maneouverable - May turn once at any point during a move or hustle

Name: Horde
Powers: Chaff - Subtract 1 from leadership rolls. 6s still auto-succeed.

Powers: Cowards - Always loses combat Chaff - Subtract 1 from leadership rolls. 6s still auto-succeed.

Name: Chumpwagon
Powers: Trojan Rats - When this unit is wiped out, place a unit of Ratkin Warriors either in the same cell, or one of the four adjacent cells. You choose which direction they are facing.

Name: Battering-Rat
Powers: Impact Hits d6+1 - If you get a charge bonus, do d6+1 attacks hitting on a 4+. These count towards who won combat. Push - If you charge an opponent without using your whole movement allowance, you can push them back. Move them back one and move into their original square. This can't push opponents off the board or into occupied squares. This counts for charge distance. Chariot - Can't sidestep

Name: Thiefwagon
Powers: Thieves - At the start of combat, if this unit is in the flank or rear of an enemy unit, steal an equipment card from it and equip this unit. Maneouverable - May turn once at any point during a move or hustle Chariot - Can't sidestep

The unit may not move on its next turn.

Name: Spitter
Powers: War Machine - Dies if it flees. Can't move into combat. Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved Virulent 4+ - Any unit wounded by this unit becomes Poisoned. At the end of each of the controlling players turns, Poisoned units take a wound on a 4+ with no armour saves allowed. Spitter Cannon - Ranged weapon. Range 5. Fires 4 shots. Can shoot over friendly units.

Name: Weblayer
Powers: War Machine - Dies if it flees. Can't move into combat. Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved Web Layer - Pick a target square within 6 and roll a die. 4, 5 or 6 - Direct hit 3 - Off by one, your choice 2 - Miss 1 - Off by two, opponent's choice Place a web in the target square. Units that move into those spaces end their turns and can't fight in combat. If this hits a unit directly, it can't fight in combat this turn. Webs are removed once stepped in. Friendly Fire - Can shoot into combat and into friendly units.

Name: Boomshaman
Powers: Master of Munitions - Explosive units and direct hits by Boomboxes gain splash. For every wound dealt, all adjacent units take a hit on a 5+, AP1. Explosive - Dies after combat. Powder Keg - d6 attacks per model. AP 4 - Reduce block rolls by 4. Lit Fuses - When this unit dies, all adjacent units take d6 attacks hitting on 4+ with AP2.

Name: Weirdweaver
Powers: Chaoscaller - Once per turn, you may reroll a single die, unless it was a 1 or a 6. Miscasts - Takes 1 damage whenever it rolls a 1 to cast a spell. Uncanny Protection - Block may not be reduced beneath 5. Mage - Can cast two spells a turn

Name: Cap'n Bangtidy
Powers: Broadside - Free action: Fire a shot directly left or right. It hits all units directly in range d6. If it's a 1, it does 1 damage to this unit instead. Each shot does 3 attacks per unit, hitting on 4+, with multiwound 2. Can be fired in combat. Friendly Fire - Can shoot into combat and into friendly units. Impact Hits d3 - If you get a charge bonus, do d3 attacks per model hitting on 4+. These count towards who won combat. Chariot - Can't sidestep

Name: Funguspeddler

Name: The Ratking
Powers: Ring of Rats - When the Ratking dies, each friendly ratkin unit heals by d6.

Name: The Cabal

Cast a spell with a +1 bonus to casting. Terrifying Sacrifice - Action: Target friendly unit within 1 takes a wound. The unit that took a wound flees. Any unit it was in combat with rolls to flee with a -1 penalty.

Name: The Twins
Powers: Flanking Attack - While both twins are alive, the twins count as attacking in the flank. If they are already in the flank, they count as attacking the rear. Cheese it - When the first twin dies, stop taking damage and immediately flee. Multishot 3 - Ranged attacks roll 3 dice per model.

If this unit already has a weapon of the same class, discard that weapon. The wounded unit gains the discarded weapon.

Name: Grand Necromancer
